name: Survive the Spydatrons (DEMO)
description:
Survive the Spydatrons (weird name I know) is a top down 2d shooter that I'm working on. I plan on adding more enemies, mechanics and gamemodes in the future.


Controls:

WASD  to move

Mouse left click  to shoot

Esc  to pause
